commitMessage:
refactor(cli): remove unused commands and options

## What Changed
- Removed 2 complete commands: `todos` and `link`
- Deleted 3 files: src/commands/todos.ts (34 lines), src/commands/link.ts (40 lines), src/lib/todo-checker.ts (173 lines)
- Removed 9 unused CLI options across internal commands:
  - explore: --force, --from-spec, --pre-populate, --decisions
  - harden: --auto-fix
  - context: --list, --recent, --todos
- Removed orphaned methods from ExploreService: handleFromSpec(), handlePrePopulate()
- Removed orphaned ContextCommand methods: listSaves(), loadRecentSave(), countTodos()
- Added comprehensive smoke tests in hodge-371-cleanup.smoke.test.ts (68 lines, 7 tests)
- Updated src/bin/hodge.ts: removed 59 lines of command/option definitions
- Updated src/commands/context.ts: removed 171 lines of unused functionality
- Refactored src/commands/explore.ts: simplified option handling (109 lines modified)
- Modified 26 files: 1,469 insertions, 677 deletions (net +792 lines including feature docs)

## Why This Change
Following the pattern established in HODGE-369 (ship command cleanup), this comprehensive audit removes commands and options that are never called by slash commands in `.claude/commands/`. This reduces CLI complexity, improves maintainability, and ensures the CLI surface area matches actual usage patterns.

The cleanup was driven by:
- Commands `todos` and `link` were never integrated into any slash command workflows
- Options like `--from-spec`, `--pre-populate`, `--decisions` were explicitly marked as "(legacy)" in code
- Other options like `--force`, `--auto-fix`, `--list`, `--recent`, `--todos` had zero usage in slash commands
- Grep analysis of `.claude/commands/` confirmed non-usage of all removed features

## Impact
- **Reduced Complexity**: Eliminated 247 lines of unused command/implementation code (todos.ts + link.ts + todo-checker.ts)
- **Cleaner CLI**: 9 fewer options across 3 commands, simpler command signatures
- **Better Maintainability**: Removed orphaned methods and legacy code paths
- **No Breaking Changes**: Only removed features never called by slash commands
- **Maintained Quality**: All 1,357 tests passing, zero TypeScript errors, zero ESLint errors
- **Comprehensive Testing**: 7 new smoke tests verify proper cleanup
- **Combined Impact**: With HODGE-369, removed 1,981 total lines of unused code from codebase
